      void initializeDispositif​(GestionZone gz, GestionAlerte ga)
      We need to initialize a list of devices at the first start of the app because the system is delivered with a set of devices
      void reinitializeDispositifWithGestAlert​(GestionAlerte ga)
      When we recover the system state from a save, the different devices are referring to an older GestionAlerte to send alert, so when we trigger a new alert, we cannot see it So we need to reinitialize the GestionAlerte of each devices that can throw alert.
      java.lang.Boolean removeDispositifByName​(java.lang.String name)

        public void initializeDispositif​(GestionZone gz,
                                 GestionAlerte ga)

      • changeZone

        public java.lang.Boolean changeZone​(java.lang.String dispositifName,
                                    java.lang.String zoneName,
                                    GestionZone gz)
        Change the zone of a device
        Specified by:
        changeZone in interface IGestionDispositif
        Parameters:
        dispositifName - The device on which we want to change the zone
        zoneName - The new zone name (it must already exist)
        gz - GestionZone to find the zone in the list of zone
        Returns:
        true if we have change the zone, false if not

      • reinitializeDispositifWithGestAlert

        public void reinitializeDispositifWithGestAlert​(GestionAlerte ga)
        When we recover the system state from a save, the different devices are referring to an older GestionAlerte to send alert, so when we trigger a new alert, we cannot see it So we need to reinitialize the GestionAlerte of each devices that can throw alert.
        Specified by:
        reinitializeDispositifWithGestAlert in interface IGestionDispositif
        Parameters:
        ga - GestionAlerte
